headline: PPL : Rhode Island Energy files to lower electricity prices for the summer
summary: Rhode Island Energy customers can expect lower electricity supply costs for the upcoming summer season beginning on April 1. The energy company has filed summer electricity supply prices for its Last...

headline: Is It Worth Investing in PPL (PPL) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: According to the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), one should invest in PPL (PPL). It is debatable whether this highly sought-after metric is effective because Wall Street analysts' recommendations tend to be overly optimistic. Would it be worth investing in the stock?
